root.title: ccc accept bonu bid ON semolina TO egypt
root.body: the commod credit corpor ccc accept bid export bonu cover sale 2,000 tonn semolina egypt u. agricultur depart say the depart say bonu 233.91 dlr per tonn make intern multifood corp the bonu paid form commod ccc stock the semolina shipment june 1987 say An addit 13,000 tonn semolina still avail egypt export enhanc program initi announc august 6 1986 say
